member.name: IFileIsInUse.CloseFile
member.summary: Closes the file currently in use.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileIsInUse.GetAppName
member.summary: Retrieves the name of the application that is using the file.
member.param: The address of a pointer to a buffer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the application name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileIsInUse.GetCapabilities
member.summary: Determines whether the file can be closed and whether the UI is capable of switching to the window of the application that is using the file.

param.name: pdwCapFlags
param.para: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives the capability flags. One or both of the following values:
0x0001. The UI can switch to the top-level window of the application that is using the file.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileIsInUse.GetSwitchToHWND
member.summary: Retrieves the handle of the top-level window of the application that is using the file.
member.param: A pointer to an HWND value that, when this method returns successfully, receives the window handle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileIsInUse.GetUsage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates how the file in use is being used.
member.param: Pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one of the values.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileIsInUse
member.summary: Exposes methods that can be called to get information on or close a file that is in use by another application. When an application attempts to access a file and finds that file already in use, it can use the methods of this interface to gather information to present to the user in a dialog box.
